title: Muthoot Microfin looking to raise $50 million in ECB
description: Muthoot Microfin, headquartered in Ernakulam and part of the Muthoot Pappachan group, aims to secure $50 million through external commercial borrowing (ECB) to diversify its funding sources and extend liability duration. The CEO anticipates a syndicated deal at a lower cost than the current average cost of funds.
